content:
a collision between a vehicle driven by a UC Santa Barbara student and a pedestrian occured today at the intersection of El Colegio and Camino Del Sur California Highway Patrol Officer Dave Nees said PERIOD

The individual was later carried from the scene on a stretcher by paramedics PERIOD Courtesy of Liam Goodin

The accident happened at approximately  p.m. when the car driver took an unprotected left turn onto El Colegio and hit a pedestrian who was crossing the crosswalk according to Nees PERIOD The collision occurred outside Santa Ynez Apartments  one of UCSBs university apartments PERIOD

University of California Police Department California Highway Patrol CHP Santa Barbara County Fire Department and Santa Barbara County Sheriffs Office responded to the scene PERIOD

The pedestrian hit their head and may have sustained further injuries Nees said PERIOD The individual was later carried from the scene on a stretcher by paramedics PERIOD

Nees also confirmed the driver to be a UCSB student PERIOD

The Nexus will continue to report on this story as more information becomes available PERIOD

Comments are closed PERIOD

title: UCSB Student Involved in Auto-Pedestrian Collision in Goleta | The Daily Nexus
name: University of California Santa Barbara
